++ Just Cave - Classified File
[[include component:image-block
 name=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/la-cadente-cantina-di-cave/Cave.jpg|
 caption=Just Cave in disguise. Face censored as per security protocols.
]]

[[include component:image-block
 name=https://i.imgur.com/tGMHLrb.jpg|
 caption= Just Cave in action. His disappearance is so rapid that security cameras cannot produce clear images.
]]
This unknown individual is one of the most complex and mysterious ones the Foundation has ever dealt with. The individual known as "[[*user Just Cave]]" has been seen lurking in the canteens of various Foundation sites, stocking up lunches and raiding the sweets area, disappearing seconds later. It is unclear whether Just Cave is a Foundation member, but his document is classified to extremely high clearance levels. Espionage rumors reveal that Just Cave has also been seen in GOC structures, Church of the Broken God places of worship, UIU offices and even some Chaos Insurgency sites, Headquarters of Delta Command included. According to every report, the individual was always doing the same actions described above. We're aware Just Cave posseses an office at the head office of the Unusual Incidents Unit, where we assume he's hiding the loot. Further investigations are ongoing.

+++ Welcome to my insignificant but very nice drawing notebook! I'm a small (tiny) artist on [https://www.twitter.com/justcave_ Twitter] and [https://www.instagram.com/cavedrawsstuff Instagram] where I post drawings that have nothing to do with this site. Here you'll see all my SCP-themed works!
+++ //yeah, they aren't many, I'll try to add more I swear//

------

+ Fanart of SCP articles

++++ SCP-085 - Hand-drawn ''Cassy''

[[collapsible show="Feel free to open, she shouldn't get out of the image" hide="I've kindly asked her to lay on this chair"]]
@@@@
+++++ **For every upvote I'll draw her a glass of whiskey**
[[image https://i.imgur.com/aANcIa4.jpg]]
[[[SCP-085|Read the article]]]
[[/collapsible]]

++++ Cap. Draghi and SCP-015-IT

[[collapsible show="Open at your own risk" hide="close"]]
@@@@
+++++ **Dunno what's more frightening, SCP-015-IT or Captain's staring.**
[[image https://i.imgur.com/sZrKTOW.jpg]]
[[[SCP-015-IT|Read the article]]]
[[[http://fondazionescp.wikidot.com/dossier-capitani-ssm-sir-e-spev#Alessandro-Draghi|Read Alessandro Draghi's dossier]]] (untranslated)
[[/collapsible]]

++++ SCP-409 "Contagious Crystal"

[[collapsible show="Open, but don't touch" hide="close"]]
@@@@
+++++ **What a pretty mirror**
[[image IMG_20211005_130117.jpg]]
[[[SCP-409|Read the article]]]
[[/collapsible]]

++++ SCP-3999 "I Am At The Center of Everything That Happens To Me"

[[collapsible show="if you really want to open it, well, the floor is yours" hide="you too are feeling... out of control?"]]
@@@@
+++++ **--Researcher Talloran needs a new pair of pants.--**
[[image IMG_20210920_162122.jpg]]
[[[SCP-3999|Read the article]]]
[[/collapsible]]

++++ SCP-049-2 Instance

[[collapsible show="It won't feel good" hide="y'know, could have been worse"]]
@@@@

[[image IMG20220206221047.jpg]]
[[[SCP-049|Read the article]]]

++++ Lunar Site-01

[[collapsible show="keep in mind what you're about to see..." hide="...not everyone can see such scenario"]]
@@@@
+++++ **Ah, our little blue pearl.**
[[image IMG_20220629_161812.jpg]]
[[/collapsible]]

+ Projects for my SCP comic -- The Blackburn Reports

++++ Characters and character designs

[[collapsible show="Dr. Lloyd Blackburn" hide="close"]]
@@@@
+++++ **If I got carried away I would tell you his whole backstory. Be thankful I can control myself. For now, know that he works in mtf Delta-5 as both a researcher and an agent.**
Beautiful bastard, huh?
[[image 20220117_103637.jpg]] [[image IMG20220102121802.jpg]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Liz" hide="close"]]
@@@@
+++++ **A lizard worthy of affection.**
an SCP ammitted to Delta-5.
[[image IMG20210723190642.jpg]]
[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show="Lloyd Blackburn, Sarah White and Liz" hide="close"]]
@@@@
+++++ **Sarah is the only one I haven't mentioned yet and has been Lloyd's best friend since college in London (they are British). She is also his boss at Delta-5.**
I'll add she's a really cute girl. And single ;)
++++++ the two dudes behind her are random agents
[[image 20220117_110532.jpg]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Agt. Lucas Peterson" hide="close"]]
@@@@
+++++ **knows something like 9 martial arts to perfection.**
And he's Australian, too. Husband material, basically.
[[image unknown.png]]
[[image https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FG12DTmX0AIx9bc?format=jpg&name=small]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="UIU Agents" hide="close"]]
@@@@
+++++ **Two pretty girls. Catherine is specifically an agent of the Unusual Incidents Unit, Devyn on the other hand is an SCP agent of Delta-5 and deals with the UIU.**
It seems obvious to me but I say it anyway, they are American. If they were real I would like to be their friend.
[[image IMG_20220112_174720_555.jpg]]
[[image IMG_20220112_174720_734.jpg]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Dr. Allison Wales" hide="close"]]
@@@@
+++++ **Ladies and gentlemen close your eyes, the amount of light this brilliant astrophysicist and aerospace engineer can reflect is 100%!**
And besides being so brilliant, she is also very pretty and of British blood like Lloyd and Sarah. I assure you, you will like her almost as much as I do <3
[[image https://i.imgur.com/x3HpRXP.jpg]]
[[/collapsible]]

++++ Other stuff

[[collapsible show="Doctor Wales' project holder" hide="close"]]

+++++ Allison'll become a really important character once her sketches turn into reality.
